item.title: Vimtex and Zathura on Arch / Manjaro (in NVIM)
item.description: Installing Vimtext with Zathura on Manjaro / Arch Linux A short introduction to installing vimtex and zathura on linux (arch / manjaro). Installations First, you should install zathura on your system I usually install packages from the integrated package manager but you are free to install them from the source. sudo pacman -S zathura To use vimtex we also need latexmk which is usually packaged inside the bigger latex utilities and applications.
